item.description:
SUMMER PICNIC POTLUCK!!!!!!!! Join us on Portland's East End for a raw vegan picnic.  Meet at Fort Allen Park (the one with the gazebo) on the Eastern Prom.  Look for a table of yummy food.

Bring a raw vegan dish (with serving utensil) to share for our RAW-licious potluck!  Your dish should serve 6-8 people & please try to use as much local & organic ingredients as you can!

Also BRING YOUR OWN plate, eating utensils, beverage and a blanket or chair to sit on!

If it's a dreary or damp day, we will meet at 81 Congress St. instead.  :-)

We host a monthly potluck, on the 3rd Sunday of the month, so put it in your calendar & come join the fun!

Looking forward to seeing you soon!  :-)
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the PArk with the gazebo on the Eastern Prom ... look for a table of yummy food!

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: August Raw Vegan Potluck
